reviews.text:
I have just had the misfortune to have to deal with the most incompetent, rude, chauvinistic, bully who works inside Sanderstead station. He sits on his wooden stool all day throwing filthy looks at station goers and speaking to them in such a manner that is beyond unacceptable. 
He’s nothing more than a glorified door man who has no business being employed by a public service, he should return to being a bully boy on a club door!!
This man challenged my son in front of me without acknowledging my presence or addressing me at all. He was the epitome of rudeness and arrogance but unfortunately lacks the brain cells to have any real impact. 
I challenged him about the way in which he dealt with the situation and he shushed me and waved me away. 
I am honest enough to admit that I was angered to the point of biting back. He is a complete chauvinist. I have witnessed his unfriendly demeanour on previous occasions, he can ruin the start or finish of your journey. He’s an absolute disgrace and Sanderstead station equally disgraceful for employing such a unfriendly, self-importance fool. This is the worst treatment I have ever been dealt in all the years of rail travel undertaken. 
It is a real disappointment as the ladies who work the ticket office are two of the loveliest, friendliest and immensely helpful people I’ve had the pleasure to meet but their great service is being undermined by the actions of this steroid filled oaf!! He is disgusting!!
I won’t use Sanderstead station again, that is at least whilst this imbecile is being allowed to work there. It is a real inconvenience but I will not be treated so poorly by this pea brained poor excuse for a man. ABSOLUTELY FUMING THIS PERSON IS A BULLY!!!!!
Slow service, unhelpful guards, and a tremendously unreliable train service.
